sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react" import "./SuccessStories.css" import ProfImg1 from "./images/prof1.png" import ProfImg2 from "./images/prof2.png" import ProfImg3 from "./images/prof3.jpg" import ProfImg4 from "./images/prof4.png" import ProfImg5 from "./images/prof5.png" const SuccessStories = () => { const [currentIndex, setCurrentIndex] = useState(0) const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false) const intervalRef = useRef(null) const successStories = [ { id: 1, name: "Sarah Johnson", role: "Senior SDET at Microsoft", image: ProfImg1, rating: 5, testimonial: "This SDET program completely transformed my career. The hands-on approach and real-world projects prepared me perfectly for my role at Microsoft.", company: "Microsoft", }, { id: 2, name: "Ahmed Khan", role: "Test Automation Lead at Google", image: ProfImg2, rating: 5, testimonial: "Excellent curriculum covering everything from basics to advanced automation frameworks. The instructors are industry experts with real experience.", company: "Google", }, { id: 3, name: "Maria Garcia", role: "QA Engineer at Amazon", image: ProfImg3, rating: 5, testimonial: "The comprehensive coverage of testing tools and methodologies gave me the confidence to tackle complex automation challenges in my current role.", company: "Amazon", }, { id: 4, name: "David Chen", role: "Automation Engineer at Netflix", image: ProfImg3, rating: 5, testimonial: "Outstanding program with practical projects that mirror real industry scenarios. The mentorship and career guidance were invaluable.", company: "Netflix", }, { id: 5, name: "Lisa Thompson", role: "SDET at Apple", image: ProfImg4, rating: 5, testimonial: "From zero testing background to landing my dream job at Apple. The structured learning path and hands-on experience made all the difference.", company: "Apple", }, { id: 6, name: "Raj Patel", role: "Test Lead at Uber", image: ProfImg5, rating: 5, testimonial: "The program's focus on both technical skills and industry best practices prepared me exceptionally well for leadership roles in testing.", company: "Uber", }, ] // Auto-scroll functionality useEffect(() => { if (!isHovered) { intervalRef.current = setInterval(() => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex === successStories.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1)) }, 4000) // Move every 4 seconds } return () => { if (intervalRef.current) { clearInterval(intervalRef.current) } } }, [isHovered, successStories.length]) const goToPrevious = () => { setCurrentIndex(currentIndex === 0 ? successStories.length - 1 : currentIndex - 1) } const goToNext = () => { setCurrentIndex(currentIndex === successStories.length - 1 ? 0 : currentIndex + 1) } const renderStars = (rating) => { return Array.from({ length: 5 }, (_, index) => ( ★ )) } return (

Success Stories

Hear from our graduates who have successfully transitioned into SDET roles at top companies

setIsHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsHovered(false)} >
{successStories.map((story, index) => (

{story.name}

{story.role}

{story.company}
{renderStars(story.rating)}
"{story.testimonial}"
))}
{successStories.map((_, index) => (
) } export default SuccessStories
